enWisdom: Scheming is wickedness, deception is evil
The one who always hatches plots [against others] is a devil
Scheming is the practice of the mutinous
Scheming is the trait of the wicked
Scheming against one who trusts in you is ingratitude [and betrayal]
The one who is always scheming [against others] is a devil in the form of a human being
Liberty is free of malice and deception
Scheming and malice are things that keep faith away

Wisdom: إِيَّاكَ وَالْمَكْرَ فَإِنَّ الْمَكْرَ لَخُلُقٌ ذَمِيمٌ
enWisdom: Beware of scheming, for indeed scheming [and plotting] is a blameworthy quality
Many a plotter has been struck down by his own stratagem
One who schemes is afflicted by his own scheming

Wisdom: مَنْ مَكَرَ بِالنَّاسِ رَدَّ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ مَكْرَهُ فِي عُنُقِهِ
enWisdom: Whoever schemes against people, Allah, the Glorified, turns his scheme back on him

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يَتَحَرَّزْ مِنَ الْمَكَايِدِ قَبْلَ وُقُوعِهَا لَمْ يَنْفَعْهُ الْأَسَفُ بَعْدَ هُجُومِهَا
enWisdom: One who is not cautious of [evil] plots before they occur, does not benefit from regret after their assault
One of the greatest deceptions is making evil appear good
There is no trustworthiness in the schemer

Wisdom: لا يَحِيقُ الْمَكْرُ السَّيِّئُ إِلَّا بِأَهْلِهِ
enWisdom: Evil scheming does not beset anyone but those who practice it
